title: Window Blind Sample, ca. 1953
medium:
Medium: synthetic threads, reeds
Technique: plain weave with unpaired and grouped warps
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18 x 18 cm (7 1/16 x 7 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Sample with warp stripes of unpaired and grouped yarns including chenille, flat metallic braid, metallic braid over a central core and shiny synthetic. Left side is mirror image of right side. Weft has large round reed followed by three narrow round reeds.

tombstone.epitaph:
